title: Can you sing a K-pop cover song for an audition or not? - Quora

response.answer_text: Umm yeah!!?? of course you can sing a k-pop song, why not???? if it suits your voice than yes but I don’t see a problem on singing a k-pop song, unless they tell you, you can’t. although if you are auditioning for an agency(like the big3) I don't advice you to since I don't think is a good idea, they might think you are just doing it to be in the same agency as your idol or sum, ex: I am not going to sing a BTS song for an audition in Big hit Ent. is better to sing another song that is not related to any artists in that agency. but if it’s a simple audition (like for a play) then go for it!
